name: Art Factory Deluxe Edition
description:
Originally made for PaintJam 2020, now revamped!

Welcome to your new job in the PaintCo Mega Mass Produced Art Plant. Work through 5 days of grueling minimum wage work, and experience the rush of the brush!

Use your mouse to fill in the boxes on the painting to match the template perfectly.

Its recommended you download and play the game for the best experience, the HTML5 version will still be here to accommodate any issues that come up with those versions

Controls:      Mouse only

The new Deluxe Edition includes:

  • Free Play mode
  • Jukebox mode
  • Ported into a new engine

A game made by

Pizzie - Coding

DEADi - Art/Music/Sounds
